articles.description: The average price of a second-hand car is now £19,776. In the week commencing 9 November 2020, the average price was just £15,033.
articles.content:
Used car values continue to surge and the average price of a second-hand motor is now 27 per cent higher than a year ago, according to the latest industry update.
Last week marked the 80th consecuti… [+6276 chars]

articles.title: Why is crypto down today? Bitcoin price crash explained and latest value after it fell more than $6,000 - iNews
articles.description: Bitcoin's value has sunk back below $60,000, having reached an all-time high of over $69,000 less than a week ago
articles.content:
Billions were wiped from the cryptocurrency market after Bitcoin and other major coins crashed on Monday night.
